column5: My place is close to downtown Kerrville. Beautiful pine ceilings and cozy fireplace. Cottage appeal in a unique and eclectic Kerrville neighborhood! Comes with screened porch and huge backyard. Washer dryer available also for guest's convenience. Great place to use as a home base for exploring Texas wine country nearby. I have a covered carport with 2 parking spaces included in the rental price-which is great to have if we get rain or bad weather, your car is protexted.
